body:
## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Migrate from Apache HttpComponents Client to Java Platform HTTP client (#493) @basil

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* Check path of old PID (if running) before exiting (#487) @nre-ableton

## 👻 Maintenance

* Adopt [POM Code Convention](https://maven.apache.org/developers/conventions/code.html#pom-code-convention) (#490) @basil
* Remove dependency on [Apache Commons Codec](https://github.com/apache/commons-codec) (#489) @basil
* Remove dependency on [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) (#488) @basil
* Miscellaneous code cleanup (#470) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [Remoting](https://github.com/jenkinsci/remoting) from 3046.v38db_38a_b_7a_86 to 3071.v7e9b_0dc08466 (#491, #483, #475) @dependabot
* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 6.2.2 to 6.3.0 (#484) @dependabot
* Bump [Micrometer](https://github.com/micrometer-metrics/micrometer) from 1.9.3 to 1.9.5 (#480, #471) @dependabot
* Bump [SnakeYAML](https://bitbucket.org/snakeyaml/snakeyaml) from 1.31 to 1.33 (#478, #472) @dependabot
* Bump [SLF4J](http://www.slf4j.org) from 2.0.0 to 2.0.3 (#477, #476, #474) @dependabot
* Bump [Maven Shade Plugin](https://github.com/apache/maven-shade-plugin) from 3.3.0 to 3.4.1 (#494, #473) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.88 to 1.90 (#486, #485) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.47 to 4.49 (#495, #479) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin BOM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bom) from 1607.va_c1576527071 to 1654.vcb_69d035fa_20 (#482) @dependabot

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* [JENKINS-69575](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-69575): Fix SLF4J configuration (#468) @basil

## 👻 Maintenance

* Remove unnecessary dependencies (#467) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.87 to 1.88 (#469) @dependabot

## 💥 Breaking changes

* Require Java 11 or newer (#463) @basil

Swarm now requires Jenkins 2.361.1 LTS or later and Java 11 on both the controller and the agent.

## 👻 Maintenance

* Use Java 11 language features where possible (#466) @basil

## 🚦 Tests

* Clean up tests (#465) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 6.1.6 to 6.2.2 (#448) @dependabot
* Bump [Micrometer](https://github.com/micrometer-metrics/micrometer) from 1.9.1 to 1.9.3 (#457, #444) @dependabot
* Bump [Remoting](https://github.com/jenkinsci/remoting) from 3028.va_a_436db_35078 to 3046.v38db_38a_b_7a_86 (#463) @basil
* Bump [SnakeYAML](https://bitbucket.org/snakeyaml/snakeyaml/src/master/) from 1.30 to 1.31 (#461) @dependabot
* Bump [SLF4J](http://www.slf4j.org) from 1.7.36 to 2.0.0 (#459) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.80 to 1.87 (#462, #458, #455, #454, #450, #446, #445) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.42 to 4.47 (#460, #456, #451, #443) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin BOM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bom) from 1478.v81d3dc4f9a_43 to 1607.va_c1576527071 (#464, #447) @dependabot

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Update Jenkins baseline (#442) @basil
* Bump parent POM from 1.76 to 1.80 (#441) @dependabot
* Bump plugin parent POM from 4.40 to 4.42 (#440, #436) @dependabot
* Bump Remoting from 4.14 to 3028.va_a_436db_35078 (#434) @basil

## 🚦 Tests

* Test with Java 17 (#426) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [Micrometer](https://github.com/micrometer-metrics/micrometer) from 1.8.4 to 1.9.1 (#433, #431, #428) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.72 to 1.76 (#432, #429, #424) @dependabot
* Bump [Remoting](https://github.com/jenkinsci/remoting) from 4.13 to 4.14 (#430) @dependabot
* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 6.1.5 to 6.1.6 (#427) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.37 to 4.39 (#423, #421) @dependabot
* Bump [Maven Shade Plugin](https://github.com/apache/maven-shade-plugin) from 3.2.4 to 3.3.0 (#422) @dependabot

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* Properly process `labelFile` which is not a single line (#420) @jimklimov
* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 6.1.4 to 6.1.5 to fix behavior on illumos (#418) @jimklimov

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [Micrometer](https://github.com/micrometer-metrics/micrometer) from 1.8.3 to 1.8.4 (#419) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 1.71 to 1.72 (#417) @dependabot

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [Remoting](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/remoting/) from 4.11.2 to 4.13 (#415, #405) @dependabot
* Bump [HttpClient](https://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-client-5.1.x/index.html) from 5.1.2 to 5.1.3 (#403) @dependabot
* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 6.1.0 to 6.1.4 (#414, #413, #410, #408) @dependabot
* Bump [Micrometer](https://github.com/micrometer-metrics/micrometer) from 1.8.2 to 1.8.3 (#409) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.33 to 4.37 (#412, #411, #407)) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.70 to 1.71 (#406) @dependabot
* Bump [SLF4J](http://www.slf4j.org/) from 1.7.35 to 1.7.36 (#404) @dependabot
* Bump [Release Drafter](https://github.com/release-drafter/release-drafter) from 5.18.1 to 5.19.0 (#416) @dependabot

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Add missing option documentation (#402) @offa

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* [JENKINS-20668](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-20668): Allow users to opt out of the agent removal process on the controller (#368) @rimitchell

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [SLF4J](https://www.slf4j.org/) from 1.7.32 to 1.7.35 (#401, #398) @dependabot
* Bump [OSHI](https://oshi.github.io/oshi/README.html) from 5.8.5 to 6.1.0 (#400, #395, #392) @dependabot
* Bump [Micrometer](https://micrometer.io/) from 1.8.0 to 1.8.2 (#399, #389) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.31 to 4.33 (#397, #394) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.69 to 1.70 (#396) @dependabot
* Bump [access modifier](https://github.com/jenkinsci/lib-access-modifier) from 1.25 to 1.27 (#393) @dependabot
* Bump [SnakeYAML](https://bitbucket.org/asomov/snakeyaml) from 1.29 to 1.30 (#391) @dependabot

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* Remove prefixed `/` from url path when getting agent labels to prevent malformed URL error (#367) @rimitchell

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [Remoting](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/remoting/) from 4.10 to 4.11.2 (#388, #381, #377) @dependabot
* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 5.8.1 to 5.8.5 (#386, #379, #369, #363) @dependabot
* Bump [HttpClient](https://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-client-5.1.x/index.html) from 5.1 to 5.1.2 (#385, #380) @dependabot
* Bump [Micrometer](https://micrometer.io/) from 1.7.3 to 1.8.0 (#383, #376, #366) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.24 to 4.31 (#384, #382, #374, #373, #372, #370, #365) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.65 to 1.69 (#387) @dependabot
* Bump [access modifier annotation](https://github.com/jenkinsci/lib-access-modifier) from 1.24 to 1.25 (#371) @dependabot

## :memo: Documentation updates

* Update documentation regarding client download (#362) @offa

## 👻 Maintenance

* Bump baseline to 2.235 (#378) @basil
* Use container agents (#364) @basil

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* [JENKINS-66335](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-66335): Set  `Content-Length` header to avoid "411 Length Required" errors with some load balancers (#360) @fatmcgav

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Add support for case-insensitive YAML enumerations (#340) @offa

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 5.7.4 to 5.8.1 (#359, #349, #341) @dependabot
* Bump [access modifier annotation](https://github.com/jenkinsci/lib-access-modifier) from 1.21 to 1.24 (#357, #350) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.19 to 4.24 (#356, #353, #351) @dependabot
* Bump [Micrometer](https://github.com/micrometer-metrics/micrometer) from 1.7.0 to 1.7.3 (#358, #348, #344) @dependabot
* Bump [SLF4J](http://www.slf4j.org/) from 1.7.30 to 1.7.32 (#352, #343) @dependabot
* Bump [Remoting](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/remoting/) from 4.9 to 4.10 (#347) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin BOM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bom) from 831.v9814430e6383 to 887.vae9c8ac09ff7 (#346, #342, #338) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.64 to 1.65 (#345) @dependabot
* Bump [SnakeYAML](https://bitbucket.org/asomov/snakeyaml) from 1.28 to 1.29 (#339) @dependabot

## 🚦 Tests

* Test with latest LTS (#361) @basil

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Custom WebSocket header support (#336) @offa

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* Fix `fsroot` option name when used in YAML configuration file (#337) @nre-ableton

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.63 to 1.64 (#335) @dependabot
* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 5.7.3 to 5.7.4 (#334) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.18 to 4.19 (#333) @dependabot
* Bump [Remoting](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/remoting/) from 4.8 to 4.9 (#332) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin BOM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bom) from 807.v6d348e44c987 to 831.v9814430e6383 (#331) @dependabot

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* [JENKINS-9639](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-9639): YAML configuration support (#326, [documentation](https://github.com/jenkinsci/swarm-plugin/blob/master/docs/configfile.adoc)) @offa

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* [JENKINS-57831](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-57831): Swarm client failed to reconnect after Jenkins controller restart (#321) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 5.6.0 to 5.7.3 (#330, #323, #315, #310, #309) @dependabot
* Bump [Micrometer](https://github.com/micrometer-metrics/micrometer) from 1.6.4 to 1.7.0 (#329, #313, #308) @dependabot
* Bump [HttpComponents Client](https://github.com/apache/httpcomponents-client) from 5.0.3 to 5.1 (#328) @dependabot
* Bump [Remoting](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/remoting/) from 4.7 to 4.8 (#325) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin BOM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bom) from 25 to 807.v6d348e44c987 (#324, #320, #314, #311, #306) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.16 to 4.18 (#312, #307) @dependabot

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Add documentation for using Swarm with [GitHub Authentication](https://plugins.jenkins.io/github-oauth/) (#319) @jimklimov
* Add rationale for Swarm to the introduction (#318) @jimklimov
* Add link to download the Swarm client (#317) @jimklimov

## 👻 Maintenance

* Migrate from deprecated [`Slave`](https://javadoc.jenkins.io/hudson/model/Slave.html) constructors to non-deprecated equivalents (#327) @offa
* Use consistent terminology for Jenkins controller (#322) @basil

## 🚦 Tests

* Adapt to latest Jenkins test harness and test against latest LTS (#316) @basil

## 🚨 Removed

* Remove support for Swarm clients older than 3.21. With the fix for [SECURITY-1200](https://www.jenkins.io/security/advisory/2020-06-03/#SECURITY-1200) in [3.21](https://github.com/jenkinsci/swarm-plugin/releases/tag/swarm-plugin-3.21), support for versions of the Swarm client older than 3.21 was deprecated. As of 3.25, support for Swarm clients older than 3.21 is removed. As a general reminder, users are strongly encouraged to update the Swarm plugin and client in lockstep. (#300) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [Remoting](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/remoting/) from 4.5 to 4.7 (#301, #273) @dependabot
* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 5.3.4 to 5.6.0 (#305, #303, #298, #294, #293, #285, #277, #275) @dependabot
* Bump [Micrometer](https://github.com/micrometer-metrics/micrometer) from 1.6.0 to 1.6.4 (#302, #291, #282, #276) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin BOM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bom) from 18 to 25 (#304, #299, #297, #292, #288, #281) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.60 to 1.63 (#295, #289, #278) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.12 to 4.16 (#296, #287, #280, #274) @dependabot
* Bump [access modifier annotation](https://github.com/jenkinsci/lib-access-modifier) from 1.16 to 1.21 (#286, #284, #283) @dependabot

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Convert documentation to AsciiDoc (#290) @basil

## 👻 Maintenance

* Update Jenkins baseline (#279) @basil

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Add [Micrometer Prometheus](https://micrometer.io/docs/registry/prometheus) metrics support (#246) @nre-ableton

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 5.2.5 to 5.3.4 (#272, #271, #270, #266, #262) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin BOM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bom) from 11 to 16 (#269, #267, #260, #253) @dependabot
* Bump [core parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.58 to 1.60 (#268, #263) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.7 to 4.12 (#265, #264, #261, #258, #255) @dependabot
* Bump [HttpClient](https://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-client-5.0.x/index.html) from 5.0.1 to 5.0.3 (#259, #254) @dependabot
* Migrate from [HttpClient 4.5.12](https://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-client-4.5.x/index.html) to [HttpClient 5.0.1](https://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-client-5.0.x/index.html) (#251) @basil

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Use table to format available options in `README.md` (#257) @mrjatinchauhan

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [Remoting](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/remoting/) from 4.3 to 4.5 (#231, #232) @dependabot
* Bump [plugin parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-pom) from 4.3 to 4.7 (#237, #248) @dependabot
* Bump [OSHI](https://github.com/oshi/oshi) from 5.2.0 to 5.2.5 (#239, #241, #243, #250) @dependabot
* Bump [Apache Commons Codec](https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-codec/) from 1.14 to 1.15 (#249) @dependabot
* Use [plugin BOM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bom) (#233) @basil

## 👻 Maintenance

* EOL usage of [JSR 305](https://jcp.org/en/jsr/detail?id=305) (#234) @basil

## 🚦 Tests

* Migrate from `RestartableJenkinsRule` to `JenkinsSessionRule` (#238) @basil
* Fix flaky disconnection-related tests in `PipelineJobTest#buildShellScriptAcrossDisconnect` (#244) @basil

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* [JENKINS-61969](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-61969): Support WebSocket protocol in Swarm (#222) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump jenkins from 1.56 to 1.57 (#229) @dependabot
* Bump maven-shade-plugin from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 (#217) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 5.1.0 to 5.1.2 (#216, #226) @dependabot

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Add documentation for Global Security Configuration (#221) @basil

## 👻 Maintenance

* Miscellaneous cleanup (#219, #220, #225, #227) @basil

## 🚦 Tests

* Add tests for Global Security Configuration (#221) @basil
* Stabilize and clean up test suite (#215, #223) @basil

## 🐛 Bug fixes

- [SECURITY-1200](https://www.jenkins.io/security/advisory/2020-06-03/#SECURITY-1200): CSRF vulnerability and improper permission checks in Stapler methods

## ⚠️ Deprecated

As of this release, Swarm clients older than 3.18 are no longer supported. Support for versions 3.18 and 3.19 of the Swarm client is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Users are strongly encouraged to update the Swarm plugin and client in lockstep.

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* [JENKINS-62033](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-62033): Swarm client `-disableSslVerification` option does not disable SSL hostname verification (#200) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump parent POMs (#203, #214) @basil
* Bump OSHI from 4.5.2 to 5.1.0 (#196, #202, #206, #208, #211) @dependabot
* Bump Maven Shade Plugin from 3.2.2 to 3.2.3 (#197) @dependabot

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* [JENKINS-44115](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-44115) - Enable Remoting working directories by default in Swarm plugin (#176, #189) @offa

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump remoting from 4.2 to 4.3 (#194) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 4.5.0 to 4.5.2 (#193) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 4.4.2 to 4.5.0 (#191) @dependabot
* Bump httpclient from 4.5.11 to 4.5.12 (#190) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 4.4.1 to 4.4.2 (#187) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 4.4.0 to 4.4.1 (#186) @dependabot

## 🚦 Tests

* Locale-dependent test fixed (#188) @offa

name: Swarm 3.18
body:
:boom: **Note:** Users of Jenkins 2.220 or later must upgrade to Swarm 3.18 or later to adapt to the removal of network discovery services in Jenkins core (see [JENKINS-61029](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-61029)).

## 🚨 Removed

* [JENKINS-61029](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-61029) Remove UDP broadcast auto-discovery service (#179, #182) @jeffret-b @basil
* EOL Docker support (#111) @basil

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* [JENKINS-48248](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-48248) Exit if PID file already exists (#114) @akomakom
* Add environment variable support (#80) @kshtsk

## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* Avoid swarm agent description ending with ": null" (#146) @jimklimov

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Update plugin POM (#185) @basil
* Bump oshi-core from 4.3.1 to 4.4.0 (#183) @dependabot
* Bump maven-shade-plugin from 3.2.1 to 3.2.2 (#184) @dependabot
* Use JUnit version from upstream POM (#181) @basil
* Remoting v4 compatibility (#180) @offa
* Bump jenkins from 1.53 to 1.54 (#172) @dependabot
* Bump httpclient from 4.5.10 to 4.5.11 (#173) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 4.3.0 to 4.3.1 (#177) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 (#169) @dependabot
* Bump remoting from 3.36 to 3.40 (#167) @dependabot
* Bump commons-codec from 1.13 to 1.14 (#170) @dependabot
* Bump slf4j-api from 1.7.29 to 1.7.30 (#166) @dependabot
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.29 to 1.7.30 (#165) @dependabot
* Update Swarm Client Parent POM to 1.53 (#164) @oleg-nenashev
* Bump oshi-core from 4.1.1 to 4.2.0 (#161) @dependabot
* Bump slf4j-api from 1.7.28 to 1.7.29 (#160) @dependabot
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.28 to 1.7.29 (#159) @dependabot
* Bump remoting from 3.35 to 3.36 (#158) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 (#155) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 4.0.0 to 4.1.0 (#154) @dependabot
* Bump remoting from 3.34 to 3.35 (#152) @dependabot
* Bump httpclient from 4.5.9 to 4.5.10 (#153) @dependabot
* POM updates (#151) @basil
* Bump maven-hpi-plugin from 3.7 to 3.8 (#150) @dependabot
* Bump remoting from 3.33 to 3.34 (#149) @dependabot
* Bump slf4j-api from 1.7.26 to 1.7.28 (#148) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 3.13.3 to 4.0.0 (#145) @dependabot
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.27 to 1.7.28 (#144) @dependabot
* Update plugin POM (#141) @basil
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.26 to 1.7.27 (#143) @dependabot
* Bump maven-hpi-plugin from 3.6 to 3.7 (#142) @dependabot
* Bump commons-codec from 1.12 to 1.13 (#140) @dependabot
* Bump remoting from 3.32 to 3.33 (#135) @dependabot
* Bump args4j from 2.0.31 to 2.33 (#120) @dependabot
* Bump remoting from 3.31 to 3.32 (#134) @dependabot
* Bump remoting from 3.30 to 3.31 (#133) @dependabot
* Bump httpclient from 4.5.8 to 4.5.9 (#128) @dependabot
* Bump annotations from 3.0.1 to 3.0.1u2 (#123) @dependabot
* Bump jsr305 from 3.0.1 to 3.0.2 (#125) @dependabot
* Bump commons-codec from 1.11 to 1.12 (#127) @dependabot
* Bump oshi-core from 3.13.2 to 3.13.3 (#126) @dependabot
* Bump maven-hpi-plugin from 3.5 to 3.6 (#124) @dependabot

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Migrate README and changelog from Confluence to GitHub (#157) @basil

## 👻 Maintenance

* Simplify node replacement code (#82) @basil
* Code cleanup (#156) @basil
* Use try-with-resources when possible (#139) @basil
* File formatting improvements (#138) @darxriggs
* Switch to SpotBugs (#131) @basil
* Remove warning suppression (#112) @basil

## 🚦 Tests

* Use a fixed port when running integration tests that restart Jenkins (#83) @basil
* Clean up label tests and add tests for both unique and non-unique IDs (#113) @basil
